While in [[Nine-Tails Chakra Mode]], Naruto gathers and balances the necessary black and white chakra to form a condensed, miniaturised [[Tailed Beast Ball]]. Upon impact, the ball explodes resulting in a very sizeable blast radius. As with the [[Rasengan]], he can extend the ball forward with the use of a [[Tailed Beast Chakra Arms|chakra arm]]. Naruto can use a [[shadow clone]] to help him form the ball,<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 595, pages 6-14</ref> while in [[Tailed Beast Mode]] he can form it on his own.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 601, page 12</ref>
